name: Flexport
overview: Integrate Flexport with your finance app using our robust data connector. Seamlessly sync freight forwarding and logistics data to gain valuable insights.
body: Our data connector allows your finance app to directly connect with Flexport, streamlining the process of importing and analyzing freight forwarding and logistics data. With real-time data syncing, you can access accurate and up-to-date information to make informed financial decisions.

metrics.title: What are the most popular metrics in Flexport to analyze?

bullets.title: On-time Delivery Rate
bullets.description: Evaluate the performance of freight forwarding and logistics operations by measuring the percentage of shipments delivered on time.

bullets.title: Cost per Shipment
bullets.description: Track the expenses associated with each shipment to assess profitability and identify cost-saving opportunities.

bullets.title: Freight Spend by Mode
bullets.description: Analyze the distribution of budget across different modes of transportation (air, sea, rail, etc.) to optimize cost and performance.

bullets.title: Shipment Volume by Region
bullets.description: Visualize the volume of shipments originating from or destined to different regions, helping you identify key markets and customer trends.

bullets.title: Customs Compliance Rate
bullets.description: Measure the compliance rate of customs documentation and processes to minimize potential risks and ensure smooth operations.

bullets.title: Inventory Holding Costs
bullets.description: Calculate the costs associated with holding inventory for accurate financial reporting and inventory management strategies.

bullets.title: Improved Cost Management
bullets.description: Analyze your freight forwarding and logistics data to identify cost-saving opportunities, reduce expenses, and optimize your supply chain.

bullets.title: Enhanced Operational Efficiency
bullets.description: By monitoring key metrics, you can improve decision-making and streamline operations, leading to increased productivity and customer satisfaction.

bullets.title: Risk Mitigation
bullets.description: Identify potential risks and compliance issues in real-time, allowing you to take proactive measures and maintain a secure and compliant supply chain.

bullets.title: Strategic Planning
bullets.description: Leverage insights from data analysis to develop robust business strategies, expand into new markets, and gain a competitive edge.
